markdownRemark.html:
Hypnotic Background

The fact that CSS can be used to generate strikingly beautiful patterns excites me. It sometimes feels slightly out of its scope but, isn’t it amazing?

Objective

Implement the following design:

We’ll worry about the animation later, implement the static pattern first.

Original design: DCX - Hypnotic Background by Nick DiMatteo.

Just in case you need a hint.

Reading

CSS Image Values and Replaced Content Level 3
